message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly beneficial for you, even more so than the apparent value.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can't go above $8,000. This is my final offer.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This is my final offer.
